vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μῠλ-ικός, ή, όν,
(μύλη [Refs] for a mill, λίθος [NT]
__II (μύλη V) of or for the grinders, ἡ μ. (i.e. ἔμπλαστρος) remedy for toothache, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: pertaining to a grinding mill millstone
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
pertaining to a grinding mill millstone
of a mill, belonging to a mill, Lk. 17:2*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: relacionado a un molino ; piedra de molino, muela
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cối đá; thuộc về cối xay
